content: double_crochet in last st 24 sts second half of border *2 single_crochet skip 1 st repeat from * to marker round 4 chain 2 1 double_crochet in first st 2 double_crochet in each st to end 48 sts # 1 round 5 repeat round 3 72 sts second handle same as first handle working from marker round 6 chain 2 1 double_crochet in each st to end points # 1 to # 4 round 7 chain 2 1dc in next st *2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts repeat from * 2 double_crochet in last st 96 sts fasten_off joining circles round 8 with wrong sides facing each other place two circles together with last closing sl sts in parallel single_crochet 72 sts along edges th rough bobble th layers single_crochet 24 sts only on lower or far side layer slip_stitch in first single_crochet to finish begin mesh when making single_crochet s tighten first yarn over hook as much as possible round 9 *chain 6 chain loop skip 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next st repeat from * around upper or near side layer close with slip_stitch in first single_crochet rnds 10 24 * chain 8 chain loop 1 single_crochet in chain loop of previous round repeat from * to end of round do not close work progresses in spirals round 25 *chain 4 chain loop 1 single_crochet in chain loop repeat from * to end round 26 * 4 single_crochet along chain loop of previous round 1 single_crochet in single_crochet of previous round repeat from * close with slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 27 single_crochet in each single_crochet close with slip_stitch skill level for pouch bag for technical assistance with this pattern please contact united states lynda rossetti 808 commerce park dr lynda@louet com ogdensburg ny 13669 for all other inquiries about louet s products please contact canada euroflax info@louet com 3425 hands round prescott ontario k0e 1t0 sport weight info@louet com www louet com 100% wet spun linen tumbel dry normal medium heat © 2011 louet north america machine washable and dryable made in canada fine / sport weight machine wash gentle 20 131 100 gram skein / 270 yards 246 meters 20 131 steam iron medium heat
